caption.p: Fractional area coverage of disappeared climates for the nine “Level 2” Alaskan ecoregions. [1] Alaska Range Transition, [2] Aleutian Meadows, [3] Arctic Tundra, [4] Bering Taiga, [5] Bering Tundra, [6] Coast Mountain Transition, [7], Coastal Rainforests, [8] Intermontane Boreal, [9] Pacific Mountain Transition
